faq_answer_1: A: ElectraCar is an app designed to help you plan your electric vehicle (EV) trips. It shows you nearby charging stations and suggests the best routes to reach them based on your starting point, destination, and current battery level.
faq_question_2: Q: How do I use ElectraCar for trip planning?
faq_answer_2: A: You simply enter your starting point and destination, and the app checks your vehicle‚Äôs battery level. If your battery isn't sufficient to reach your destination, the app will suggest nearby charging stations along the route.
faq_question_3: Q: Do I need to enter my vehicle type, plug type, and model in the app?
faq_answer_3: A: Yes, to get the most accurate route recommendations, please enter your vehicle type, plug type, and model in the app. This ensures we show you compatible charging stations.
faq_question_4: Q: How does ElectraCar determine the best route for my trip?
faq_answer_4: A: ElectraCar calculates the best route based on your starting point, destination, and battery level. If your battery isn‚Äôt enough to reach your destination, the app will guide you to nearby charging stations along the way.
faq_question_5: Q: Can I reserve a charging spot at a station through the app?
faq_answer_5: A: No, currently, ElectraCar does not support reservations. We recommend arriving early to secure a spot at your selected charging station.
faq_question_6: Q: Is my data safe when using ElectraCar?
faq_answer_6: A: Yes, your privacy and data security are very important to us. We do not share your data with third parties, and we only use it to improve your experience with the app.
faq_question_7: Q: How do I update my vehicle details in the app?
faq_answer_7: A: You can easily update your vehicle type, model, and plug type in the app‚Äôs settings or profile section. Keeping this information up-to-date ensures accurate recommendations.
faq_question_8: Q: Will the app work without an internet connection?
faq_answer_8: A: ElectraCar requires an internet connection to show real-time data, such as charging station availability and route updates. For the best experience, ensure you have a stable internet connection.
faq_question_9: Q: How do I report a problem with a charging station?
faq_answer_9: A: If you encounter a problem with a charging station, you can report it through the app‚Äôs support section, and we will investigate and update the information as needed.
faq_question_10: Q: How do I contact customer support for help with the app?
faq_answer_10: A: You can contact our customer support team by visiting the 'Me' section in the app and using the support page, which contains our email address. We‚Äôre happy to assist you with any questions or issues.

terms_intro: Welcome to ElectraCar. By using this app, you're agreeing to follow the rules outlined here. If you don‚Äôt agree with anything, please don‚Äôt use the app.
terms_1_body: ElectraCar helps you plan your trip by letting you choose a starting point and destination, then checking your current battery level. If you don‚Äôt have enough charge to reach your destination, the app will guide you to a nearby charging station along the way. It doesn‚Äôt handle payments or reservations.
terms_2_body: We use your location to show relevant stations and routes. Your data stays private and is only used to improve your experience.
terms_3_body: We try our best to keep the information accurate, but we can‚Äôt guarantee that all stations are available or working at all times.
terms_4_body: Please use the app responsibly. Don‚Äôt try to misuse or break the app in any way.
terms_5_body: These terms might change as the app grows. If we make any important updates, we‚Äôll do our best to let you know. We also include the date of the last update at the top of this page so you can stay informed.
intro: At ElectraCar, your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our app. By using ElectraCar, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
infoCollect: We collect the information you provide when you use the app, such as your location and battery status. We also gather some technical information automatically, like your device type and operating system version, to help improve our service.
useInfo: The information we collect is used to provide you with accurate route suggestions, show nearby charging stations, and improve your overall experience. We may also use your data to troubleshoot issues, send updates, and improve our services.
protectInfo: We take security seriously and use a variety of security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of electronic storage or transmission is 100% secure, and we can‚Äôt guarantee absolute security.
shareInfo: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information. However, we may share your information with trusted partners who help us operate the app or provide services to you, under strict confidentiality agreements.
yourChoices: You have control over your information. You can choose to turn off location services or stop using the app at any time. However, most features of the app may not work as intended without location data.
changesPolicy: We may update this privacy policy from time to time as the app evolves. If we make any significant changes, we‚Äôll notify you through the app or via other means. The date of the last update will always be displayed at the top of this page.
thankYou: Thank you for trusting ElectraCar with your information!
